Comments_List: This course was a great way to connect with the other majors in Religious Studies and learn more about the interesting work they're doing. It was also a great way to get feedback on my own thesis progress.

The course's strength is its flexibility. Because each of us came at it with a different specialty, we could learn a lot not only about the wide array of topics, but about different methodologies and research styles. I suppose its strength is also its weakness, because it's hard to have clear direction and focus in a course without a unifying topic.
I would recommend this course to another Religious Studies major. It's a good way to stay on track with the senior essay and make connections with other students.
